item.description:
Hope you all got the update on this date change...also I hear that they have filled that RSVP and are know taking waiting list requests, I suggest calling the Art center to be wait listed...

This looks fascinating....Jeanne-Claude passed away in 2009, but this project forges on....let's see what it is all about!

Over the River: Christo and Jeanne-Claude

Over The River: A Project for the Arkansas River, State of Colorado , is a work in progress– a proposed site-specific installation by renowned international environmental artists, Christo and Jeanne-Claude.
Original artworks, including collages, drawings, and films created in preparation for the project will be on view in our gallery, flanked on the banks of the Saugatuck River. Christo and Jeanne-Claude’s projects often require decades to come to fruition and, through the proposal and installation phases, engage communities in a celebration of art and the environment. The Westport Arts Center hopes that we can facilitate discussions within our own community with this important exhibition.

Due to the anticipated volume of attendance, pre-registration is required.* Doors will open at 6pm and entrance is guaranteed for the first 150 confirmed registrants until 6:30pm.
*RSVP by phone only to Box Office Manager, Jackie Barchilon,
at (203) 222-7070 x106.

 

 

About the project:

Over The Riveris a temporary work of art by the artists Christo and Jeanne-Claude.  Christo plans to suspend 5.9 miles of silvery, luminous fabric panels high above the Arkansas River along a 42-mile stretch of the river between Salida and Cañon City in south-central Colorado.

Christo is currently working to obtain the necessary permits so that his team can begin the installation process. He is hoping to exhibit Over The River for two consecutive weeks in August, 2014.

http://christojeanneclaude.net/#

What a mess!! They must have changed the date. It still says 7-8 on Christos' own site!!! http://christojeanneclaude.net/exh_current.shtml I hear that the event is already booked up for 6-30. But anyone still interested call and see if you can be wait listed...
item.how_to_find_us: I will wear the bw scarf with piano keys
item.name: Over the River: Christo and Jeanne-Claude Opening Reception
